hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the song written in the #royal tomb# is #the Kokiri Emerald#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that you can tune a piano but you can't tune a fish?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Medallion# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Forest Temple# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #King Dodongo#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that obtaining the #underwater silver rupees in Gerudo Training Ground# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #the Broken Sword#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern GS Push Block Room

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.
